heading: HR01617
0: RESOLUTION TO LOOK INTO THE FULFILLMENT BY THE CONCERNED GOVERNMENT OFFICES AND OFFICERS OF THEIR LEGALLY MANDATED ROLES AND DUTIES IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF OUR LAWS ON OFWs, TO PROTECT OUR OFWs,  PARTICULARLY ON THEIR DEPLOYMENT TO NON- OR PARTIALLY COMPLYING COUNTRIES TO THEIR DETRIMENT AND TO URGE THE SAME TO COME UP WITH A COMPREHENSIVE PLAN TO ADDRESS THE CONCERNS  OF THE WILL BE AFFECTED WORKERS, ON THE ERADICATION OF FEARS OF RESORT TO ILLEGAL RECRUITERS BY THE OFWs WHEN A BAN ON DEPLOYMENT IS NECESSARILY BEING CONSIDERED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES, IN AID OF LEGISLATION
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2018-02-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01617
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO LOOK INTO THE FULFILLMENT BY THE CONCERNED GOVERNMENT OFFICES AND OFFICERS OF THEIR LEGALLY MANDATED ROLES AND DUTIES IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF OUR LAWS ON OFWs, TO PROTECT OUR OFWs, PARTICULARLY ON THEIR DEPLOYMENT TO NON- OR PARTIALLY COMPLYING COUNTRIES TO THEIR DETRIMENT AND TO URGE THE SAME TO COME UP WITH A COMPREHENSIVE PLAN TO ADDRESS THE CONCERNS OF THE WILL BE AFFECTED WORKERS, ON THE ERADICATION OF FEARS OF RESORT TO ILLEGAL RECRUITERS BY THE OFWs WHEN A BAN ON DEPLOYMENT IS NECESSARILY BEING CONSIDERED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES, IN AID OF LEGISLATION
